article_title: Q&A: Perry Blanchard has the Orpheum in his blood
article_text:
Madison, WI (53711)

Today

Areas of patchy fog early. Scattered thunderstorms this morning, then partly cloudy during the afternoon hours. High around 85F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%..

Tonight

Partly to mostly cloudy skies with scattered thunderstorms mainly during the evening. Low 64F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

article_metadata.author: Rob Thomas

og.description: Blanchard is the general manager of the Orpheum Theater, which will have its first full lineup of concerts under Gus Paras' ownership this fall.
